author: joeyaiello
body: Placeholder document for @HemantMahawar and I to do a sweep of `6.0.0-beta2` and `6.0.0` issues tagged `Issue-Enhancement` and `Issue-Bug` to update the [Known Issues doc](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/KNOWNISSUES.md) for `beta1`.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Heads up @HemantMahawar, I'm working on this one.

title: Update known issues document
